__e: Uh, listen, I just came from work. Is there some room where I could change in? Nope.
Perhaps you can show me where I can dress and we'll both be out of hot water.
You didn't mention there was a place to get dressed there.
Doesn't he know he's in my service and I must change after hunting?
Pat, you old pirate, why didn't you tell me to change uniforms?
So I don't understand why I have to move to learn what he probably already knows.
Let's just root for a big offer so we can move out of this room into a real office.
And it's not like we can pick up and move.
I'll give you a moment to change.
So I should go change and we can go.
And if that means we have to move somewhere else and start all over, then that's what we'll do.
Who works for the social good, right ?
